description: a(1) = 1; a(2) = 2; a(n) == a(k) (mod n-k) for all 1 < k < n.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
mathematica: t = {1, 2}; Do[AppendTo[t, ChineseRemainder[t, Reverse[Range[Length[t]]]]], {n, 3, 30}] (* _T. D. Noe_, Dec 29 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
